General.Name: APPlife Digital Solutions Inc
General.Description: APPlife Digital Solutions, Inc. is a venture capital firm and a business incubator specializes in seed capital investments. The firm typically invests in e-commerce and cloud-based solutions. It builds and develops apps and Websites. It is a portfolio manager and prefers to take equity position in its portfolios. The company was founded in 2018 and is based in San Francisco, California with an additional office in Shanghai, China.
General.Address: 555 California Street, San Francisco, CA, United States, 94104
